credits.description: Developed with love and dedication by the Noor - Pray Tracker team. Special thanks to our community for their continuous support and feedback.
credits.title: Credits

mission.description: Noor - Pray Tracker is dedicated to helping Muslims maintain their daily prayers, track their spiritual journey, and build a stronger connection with Allah. Our goal is to make prayer tracking simple, meaningful, and rewarding.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect only the information you provide to us directly, such as your name, email, profile image, and selected preferences. No sensitive or unnecessary information is collected.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: Your information is used only to operate the app, maintain your account, provide features, personalize your experience, and improve the overall service. We do not use your data for advertising.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your data. We do not share your personal information with third parties except when required to operate core app services, comply with legal obligations, or protect the security of the platform.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We apply standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. However, no method of transmission or storage is completely secure.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.content:
Noor Pray Tracker offers auto-renewable subscriptions. Available subscription options include:

‚Ä¢ Monthly Subscription: Renews every month.
‚Ä¢ Annual Subscription: Renews every year.

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your Apple ID account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.

You can manage or cancel your subscription at any time in your device settings: Settings ‚Üí Apple ID ‚Üí Subscriptions.

Prices for subscriptions are clearly displayed in the app before purchase and may vary by region. All purchases are processed securely by Apple. We do not have access to your payment information.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy when necessary. If significant changes occur, we will notify you through the app or other appropriate means.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or requests regarding privacy or subscriptions, you can contact us at any time using the support channel provided in the app.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By using this app, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, you may discontinue using the app at any time.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.content: You agree to use the app only for lawful and intended purposes. You must not misuse the service, interfere with its operation, or attempt unauthorized access.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.content: Noor Pray Tracker offers auto-renewable subscriptions. Available options include monthly and annual subscriptions. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage or cancel your subscription at any time in your device settings: Settings ‚Üí Apple ID ‚Üí Subscriptions. All purchases are processed securely by Apple and we do not have access to your payment information. Prices may vary by region and are clearly displayed in the app before purchase.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: You are responsible for any content you submit within the app. You confirm that your content does not violate any laws, rights, or the privacy of others.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate access to the app if we detect misuse, violations of these terms, or activity that threatens the safety or operation of the service.

changes.title: Changes to These Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. Continued use of the app after changes means you accept the updated terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about these terms, you can contact us at any time using the support channel provided in the app.

subscription.title: Noor Premium
subscription.subtitle: Strengthen your faith journey with powerful tools for prayer consistency, community accountability, and spiritual growth.
subscription.terms: Auto-renews unless cancelled. Cancel anytime from your account settings. By subscribing, you agree to our Terms of Service.

features.unlimitedFriends: Connect with unlimited friends and family to encourage each other in prayer consistency and spiritual growth.
features.friendGroups: Create prayer circles and accountability groups to stay motivated together on your faith journey.
features.detailedStats: Gain deep insights into your prayer patterns with beautiful charts and streaks that inspire consistency.
features.prayerReminders: Never miss a prayer with smart, customizable reminders that adapt to your location and schedule.
features.customThemes: Personalize your spiritual space with beautiful Islamic-themed designs and color schemes.
features.adFree: Focus on what matters most - your prayers - with a completely ad-free, distraction-free experience.
features.prioritySupport: Get dedicated support from our team to help you make the most of your prayer tracking journey.
features.newFeatures: Be the first to access new features and improvements as we continuously enhance your experience.

intro_welcome.headline: Welcome
intro_welcome.body: Build a steady prayer routine with gentle reminders, qibla guidance, and simple learning‚Äîat your pace.

prayer_knowledge.headline: Do you know how to pray?
prayer_knowledge.body: Choose what fits you today. We‚Äôll tailor the experience.

yes_i_know.label: Yes, I know
yes_i_know.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll focus on consistency, reminders, and tracking‚Äîso your routine stays strong.

im_learning.label: I‚Äôm learning
im_learning.feedbackBody: Small steps add up. We‚Äôll guide you with clear, bite-sized lessons and practice support.

no_not_yet.label: Not yet
no_not_yet.feedbackBody: No worries. We‚Äôll help you learn from the basics with patience and clarity.

support_needed.headline: Do you need support to stay consistent with prayer?
support_needed.body: Choose your comfort level‚Äîthere‚Äôs no judgment.

yes_i_need_support.label: Yes, I want support
yes_i_need_support.feedbackTitle: You don‚Äôt have to do this alone
yes_i_need_support.feedbackBody: Support makes consistency easier. We can set up motivation that feels right for you.

some_support.label: Maybe a little
some_support.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll keep it light‚Äîgentle reminders and simple goals that won‚Äôt overwhelm you.

im_good.label: I‚Äôm good
im_good.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll stay out of your way and keep things clean and focused‚Äîonly what you need.

learn_islam.headline: Would you like to learn more about Islam?
learn_islam.body: Pick a direction‚Äîyour feed can be personalized.

quran_surahs.label: Qur‚Äôan & Surahs
quran_surahs.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll suggest short surahs, meaning highlights, and a gentle reading routine.

basics.label: Islam basics
basics.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll cover essentials in clear steps‚Äîbelief, worship, and daily practice.

im_good.label: I‚Äôm good for now
im_good.feedbackBody: You can explore learning later. We‚Äôll keep the focus on your prayer journey.

why_here.headline: Why are you here today?
why_here.body: Select all that apply. We‚Äôll personalize your setup.

pray_5_times.label: Pray 5 times daily
pray_5_times.feedback: We‚Äôll prioritize prayer times, streak-friendly goals, and practical reminders.

track_progress.label: Track my progress
track_progress.feedback: We‚Äôll set up simple tracking and reflections‚Äîfocused on improvement, not perfection.

learn_how_to_pray.label: Learn how to pray
learn_how_to_pray.feedback: We‚Äôll add step-by-step prayer guidance with short lessons and practice prompts.

just_checking.label: Just checking it out
just_checking.feedback: Take your time. We‚Äôll keep the experience light until you‚Äôre ready.

attribution.headline: Where did you hear about us?
attribution.body: This helps us improve and support more people.

friend_family.label: Friend or family
friend_family.feedbackBody: Word of mouth means a lot. May it be a benefit for everyone.

social_media.label: Social media
social_media.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll keep sharing helpful content‚Äîin a calm, respectful way.

app_store_search.label: App Store / Search
app_store_search.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll do our best to make your experience clear, simple, and useful.

masjid_community.label: Masjid / community
masjid_community.feedbackBody: Community support is powerful. May Allah strengthen our bonds.

online_article.label: Article / blog / website
online_article.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll keep the experience thoughtful and practical.

other.label: Other
other.feedbackBody: Thanks for sharing. You can tell us more anytime in Settings.

location_permission.headline: Where are you praying from?
location_permission.body: Allow location to show accurate prayer times and qibla direction for your area.

onAllow.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll use this only to help with qibla and prayer times.

onDeny.feedbackBody: You can set your city manually anytime.

notification_permission.headline: Never miss prayer times
notification_permission.body: Turn on notifications for prayer reminders, gentle nudges, and important updates you choose.

onAllow.feedbackBody: Reminders are on. You can customize the tone and schedule anytime.

onDeny.feedbackBody: You can enable reminders later in Settings whenever you‚Äôre ready.

all_set.headline: You‚Äôre all set
all_set.body: We‚Äôre with you‚Äîone prayer at a time. May your journey be steady and full of barakah.

socialProof.note: Social proof text should be used only if you can verify this rating in your product.

splash.headline: {{APP_NAME}}
splash.subheadline: A calm space to support your salah, step by step.

friends_motivation_modal.headline: Motivation with friends
friends_motivation_modal.body: Invite friends to encourage each other, share gentle check-ins, and celebrate progress‚Äîwithout pressure.
